website_summaries.verdict: This cream is well priced and works even on old stretch marks.
pros: Effective at preventing stretch marks and making them fade, including ones you’ve had for years
Light, rather than heavy, consistency of cream is important to some
cons: Some feel it’s expensive, since you only get 4 oz

customer_reviews.title: Light cream, free lotion after rating
customer_reviews.text: The cream is light. For sensitive skin, it is not all over your bell so you have less issue with itching. But the company is having a promotion to send another one free if you leave a five star comment right after purchase, that makes me doubt the comment because you need time to verify if a stretch mark cream works. But hey free lotion. I’ll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Bishan Li

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am 34 weeks pregnant and I started using this product after second trimester. My husband was worried that I don’t get crazy stretch marks so he find this product for me and believe me it’s working. I haven’t got any crazy stretch marks or itching. In the 35th week I see very light few tiny marks around my belly bottom but it’s very hard to see for others and I believe by keep using this product even after delivery those small marks will be gone. My sister had really bad stretch marks after her first baby and she is very jealous I didn’t got any 😇 thanks to COS. I definitely recommend this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Patel

customer_reviews.title: I believe in miracles!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product so these are before pictures. After the bottle runs out I will update this review and include pictures. I used my flash to intensify the stretch marks. The bottle is not very big so I am not sure how long it will last. My skin seems to soak it up quick. The smell is very faint but it reminds me of a sweet beer. I love how soft it leaves my skin, so silky. I hope I have as much success as the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer, well worth the $$ 2 bottles got me through my entire pregnancy.. started using it the moment I found out I was pregnant. Not a single sign of a stretch mark.. we’ll see once I give birth but my skin feels like it should bounce back just fine. I even used it on my breasts even though they haven’t really grown. Just a preventative measure.. will definitely continue to use it when my milk starts to come in. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie C

customer_reviews.title: Good, but warm it up
customer_reviews.text: I’m only 22 weeks pregnant with my first child. However, I’ve been using this since about 14 weeks. I’m using it as a moisturizer to prevent stretch marks. I’m so anxious about getting them as I have some old ones on my inner thighs from puberty. So far so good, but we’re still early. PS I’ve been using this with a lotion heater and it works wonders!! I only keep it on for about 10-20 minutes or else the lotion gets too watered down. Room temperature lotion on my stomach is way too cold for me!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I only write reviews if the product absolutely blew my mind away and this definitely did! I loved this product! Didn’t think I would get much of a difference in using it but I’ve been using it for a little over a week and I already notice a huge difference. My stretch marks are going away for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Phillips

customer_reviews.title: So far it seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this lotion and seems to be working. I started using it around a week after giving birth, I got some stretch marks around my belly button. I started using it only once a day but then followed the directions and it seems to be working. My stretch marks are turning white and I can almost not see them anymore. This lotion does not have a strong smell and you can feel it stays on and it is quickly absorbed onto the skin. The botrle is not too big but I believe it may be enough as you don't have to put a lot on to cover a big area.
customer_reviews.author: Yunior L. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell and texture. It hydrate my skin very well. I just wished the bottle system was better. I need to make it upside down a little bit shake and squeeze so hard until it comes out. But the texture is not thick so jar may not suitable then I guess it was the best? As far as the effectiveness on stretch marks, I still have them on my thighs. I just try rubbing twice a day hoping it works.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewer323

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Been using the cream so far during my month 6 & 7 of pregnancy (I’m huge), and no stretch marks at all! I use it after showers and even maybe just once earlier in the day if I’m feeling itchy. It doesn’t feel greasy, which is nice since I carry it in my purse for when I’m at work. There’s no scent so that’s nice for sensitive stomachs. This is a nice product and I will purchase again and for future pregnancies.
customer_reviews.author: TeamFamilyA

customer_reviews.title: My Fourth review!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hello friends ! M extremely happy to find the best stretch marks cream for preventing those scary scars on my tummy. Now at 28weeks I still don’t see any marks on my tummy....but as I said I have been using it along with some scrubbing twice a week. One suggestion - Always keep the bottle upside down so that you don’t have to put a lot of pressure on the bottle to squeeze the lotion out once it’s close to finish. Thank you COS Naturals ! I would like to surely try the cellulite cream as a part of postnatal repair.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product. It made a huge difference in my stretch marks. I wasn't looking for a miracle, but it helped more than expected. I only had it for one week and I noticed a 30/40% difference already. I'm ready to see the difference in the upcoming weeks.
customer_reviews.author: canyoufeelit

customer_reviews.title: Im seeing a difference
customer_reviews.text: Im using this product for stretch marks and as of now, I have seen small changes. I haven’t really been using it for long so I’m sure that it would make a difference the more I use it. The scent is great and it moisturizes really good but I wish the bottle was bigger, it’s really pricy for such a small bottle.
customer_reviews.author: aliety pinero

customer_reviews.title: Good and safe ingredients. Works good
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order of this cream, and I have been very satisfied with it. I have stretch marks on my hips and some scars from surgeries so I'm happy that I found a natural product that actually works. A little goes a long way so the amount you get in this container will last quite a while. I recommend this to everyone especially during pregnancy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money sink
customer_reviews.text: Product made no difference in stretch marks. Have some under my arm from working out. No difference after 3 weeks 2 times a day. Waste of money if you ask me my officer opinion
customer_reviews.author: Duck man

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and absorbency!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews about the product I decided to give it a chance. I ordered when I was 3 months pregnant to prevent strech marks. The product is great, I like the smell and easy absorption. Anyways because of so many products out there I decided to try different cream for same propose, it was a Belly Butter from Earth Mama and although that one seem to work too I just didn't like how sticky it was.. it also has stronger scent. So I decided to stick with COS Naturals. So far I am 7 months pregnant with really big belly and have not got any strech marks.
customer_reviews.author: Klaas_SV

customer_reviews.title: Good for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I Have some stretch marks due to weight gain and loss. I also have a burn scar that is discolored. I have been using this product for a week and have already noticed a significant fading of stretch marks. Unfortunately I have noticed no difference in the burn scar as of yet. I will continue to use it for stretch marks and seek something more specialized for burns.
customer_reviews.author: Gg2222

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cream! I am 5 months pregnant, and this product seems to work right away for me! I wake up in the morning, see a new stretch mark, used the cream and it goes away by lunch. It’s the weirdest thing! I just hope it keeps working so well!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I hate the bottle this comes in, makes for difficult application
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way the felt going into the skin, as well as the neutral smell. However, I HATE HATE the bottle this comes in. It is really difficult to squeeze this hard bottle. It just makes it so much more difficult to incorporate into a daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for probably 6 weeks. Started with part of a bottle my sister gave me and then bought my own. According to my dermatologist, there's no "cure" for stretchmarks but I'm hoping after using this enough, they'll at least start to fade since they're new now. Love the smell! Seems to be making an arm burn fade from red to my normal skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Colorado and was getting the beginning of stretch marks early on in my pregnancy. I started using this cream on my belly and the red spots disappeared after just a few days!! I had been using Vitamin C and A oils as well as coconut oil and a bunch of different lotions, but nothing touched them. This cream took care of them so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: jmjville

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product - no stretch marks after pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this stretch mark lotion for my first pregnancy and now again for my second. It worked wonders for my first pregnancy, all of my stretch marks eventually went away and did not have a single one. This stuff has been a miracle for me - looking forward using it for round 2! I’ve tried several other popular products and nothing worked for me like this one did. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the second time during my third trimester. I have been prone to stretch marks in the past when gaining/losing weight, but have noticed none during my pregnancy while using this product. Goes on lightly, with no greasy texture. The other plus about this product is the customer service. The first time I received the product, the packaging was damaged and a portion of the lotion had come out of the bottle. The company sent me another one immediately free of charge, along with a 25% off coupon on my next order. Will definitely recommend to my pregnant friends!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Works decently well
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. I notice a slight difference on my stomach and parts of my legs where the stretch marks are after my pregnancy, however, the results aren't as prominent as I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Carlson

customer_reviews.title: There has been some fading! :D
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a little over a month (~religiously! lol) putting it on in the night after my bath and in the morning and I do see slight improvement in some areas! ~Edges have started to fade and I will definitely continue to use this for another month or 2 and I will update my review! But totally; so far, so good! ~Because there has been some fading! :D
customer_reviews.author: The Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this product right after she delivered our baby born July 2017. She’s been using it for the past year and a half and has been very satisfied with the results. It’s not a miracle worker (i.e, it doesn’t diminish stretch marks instantaneously) but we both can tell that the stretch marks have dramatically diminished after 1.5 years of continued use. It has a nice light fragrance as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Guglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Made my stretch marks lighten up immensely in just one month!
customer_reviews.text: This product did a wonderful job! I’ve been using this product since I had my son a month ago and I’ve seen a huge difference! Had I known about it while I was pregnant would have definitely used it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this product for a very long time but from the time I have used it I have seen a difference in the colorations of my scars. But I also use other ointments with it
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. I've used this almost a month but not perfectly. I forget sometimes, which could be why I feel like I haven't seen much progress. I'm almost finished my first bottle. Once I go through my second I'll update my review. I recommend taking pictures of your marks so you can see your progress!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started Use Today
customer_reviews.text: Starting using this product today (2 applications so far) & I’m already liking it! The smell of this is nice & it’s not greasy. Rating this 4stars as I’m obviously not sure yet how well it works on my marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this cream since my 12th week. I’m a first time mom so I didn’t want to chance any stretch marks. I am now in my 29th week and still have not seen one. I put this on generously twice a day or after I get out of the shower. Works like a charm. I thought I’d see a stretch mark by now, but not one! Unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Riddersen

customer_reviews.title: Ok so far
customer_reviews.text: Kinda pricy.. bottle is tiny.. but hope it works for me.. will update my review as I try it!
customer_reviews.author: Dina N

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this cream for preventing stretch marks as well as treating a recent scar on my eyebrow. Im hoping it makes a difference! I like the smell, it's very light and sweet. Also it absorbs into the skin quickly and I don't have to use very much of it.
customer_reviews.author: Denica Davin

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion, doesn’t work on stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes it would fade my stretch marks. It has not made a difference in the month I’ve been using it (morning and night). It’s also expensive. However it dries fast and is not oily at all! Hopefully it will work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: JordN

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very soft and smells very good. Not oily and so far seems to be helping after a few days. I shall update this review after a month with more details.
customer_reviews.author: eternal

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the cream feels , seems to be making a difference already . No itching anymore, smells good . Will post results after couple weeks !
customer_reviews.author: Nicole.d

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture
customer_reviews.text: I guess ultimately the results remain to be seen, but I've been using this a few weeks now, and what I like about it is that the texture is more like lotion than body butter (absorbs quickly). There are some posts about the scent, but I actually like it -- finally a scar cream that doesn't make me smell like brownies.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bullock

customer_reviews.title: The fading of stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I saw the review of this product online and decided to try it. Since using this product for almost a month I have seen my stretch marks fading and my skin feels more revitalized. My stretch marks have not completely gone but I have seen improvements. I would love to continue using this product to see more drastic effect.
customer_reviews.author: TAM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 2 weeks straight, morning and night and also whenever i took a shower and this didn’t lighten my stretch marks at all. I stopped using this and the stretch marks are lightening on their own now. I started at 39 weeks pregnant and used 2 weeks postpartum.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Effective stretch mark cream
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped to reduce the appearance of my very old stretch marks on my calves. I've been using it for a couple of weeks and notice the difference. It hasn't completely removed them, but it's working! It feels like light and smooth on the skin, so it's good to use even just to moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Kleela

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work as I expected. It did not lighten nor improve the looks of my stretch marks. I also found it difficult to come out of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I think this stretch mark cream is just okay. It’s hard for me to tell if it really helps or not, bc I just started getting stretch marks but I think that’s because I’m in week 38 and extremely prone to stretch marks. I wish the bottle lasted longer, one bottle only lasts me 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great and natural
customer_reviews.text: The cream is light and silky which leaves my skin feeling very smooth. I have really bad stretch marks from my pregnancy and after applying the lotion for a week i can see that the marks are starting to lighten. I would totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice but didn’t see much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice and lasted for about 2 months. I used it about 4 times a week and didn’t see any results.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It’s good and hydrating if you want something less thick but ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s good and hydrating if you want something less thick but I can’t attest to the prevention of stretch marks at all. I went with an organic belly butter after this and I’m very happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y. Velez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream to prevent stretch Mark's with my second pregnancy. So far so good. This cream is very light and absorbs well. The smell is pleasant and seems to be working so far. I do wish it came in a different container because it's a bit difficult to get out of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shota Mamukashvili

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days but so far I'm happy. It has a light sent and rubs in completely. Some other lotions leave a film on my skin and have a funky smell.
customer_reviews.author: Corrales

customer_reviews.title: So Far Happy
customer_reviews.text: Although the look of the bottle itself is not the most appealing (rather small, tropical themed), the actual product itself is very nice! The scent is really nice and I felt imy body soaking it up as soon as I used it! On my first week now, excited for the results!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Hyaluronic acid 6th ingredient
customer_reviews.text: I have high hopes for this product to help fade my stretch marks. I know hyaluronic acid is something that has been proven to reduce stretch marks. I just wish, for this price, there was more included, I feel like 4 ounces will finish so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shirin M

customer_reviews.title: I have used this for over a month and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over a month and it has smoothed out my stretch marks. It has not reduced them or faded them away but I will get another bottle and see if maybe I just need to use it for more time. I will update my review in a month or so. The cream is definitely worth a try though! :)
customer_reviews.author: Laritza Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and it dose work
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Product. Smells good and spreads easily - non greasy. Super smooth and soft feeling after applying the cream. Made a noticeable difference in my stretch marks after a few weeks. I've tried other products and this one works the fastest in my opinion. I will definitely re-order this cream again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for preventing or minimizing the looks of stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: ncarson

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to seeing it’s benefits
customer_reviews.text: Recently started using this product.. excited to see its affects.. will update as I see improvement of my stretch marks
customer_reviews.author: Nail Nail

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product from pregnancy week 18-29 and so far I have not gotten any stretch marks! I believe it is helping quite a bit, and am about to order more for the rest of my pregnancy! It also does not stink. It is almost odorless, which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am not pregnant but i had some nasty stretch marks on my thighs and butt cheeks.After using this product for about 2 weeks I am noticing visible reduction of my marks.Some of them are completely gone and some have faded very much.Smells nice, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime N.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!! I’m on my second bottle and have already noticed a difference in my stretch marks! I use a generous amount twice a day (like the instructions say) so the bottle goes fast. But it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: BHees

customer_reviews.title: Prevents stretch marks. This product is amazing i saw results within the 2nd week
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get started with using the cream due to the great picture reviews. It smells very natural. I apply it to my upper thighs and breasts where I have stretch marks. This cream definitely has reduced their appearance. My stretch marks hardly noticeable anymore. I will continue to purchase from this company!
customer_reviews.author: peggy colby

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a few products by COS and all of them are the best! I had a lot of stretch marks on my breast after pregnancy and I saw a perfect results after 3 times of using this cream! It’s a miracle! I’m highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: evaevgerd

customer_reviews.title: Very good cream, wish the bottle dispensed product better
customer_reviews.text: I began noticing a difference within 2 weeks of consistent use (I applied it 3x a day, once more than the bottle recommends). The only issue I have with this cream is that the bottle makes it hard to get every last drop of product. Other than that, I love this cream and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: yay05

customer_reviews.title: It smells good and my skin soaks it right up
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a few days now. I am already seeing results and can't wait to see the results in a few weeks. It smells good and my skin soaks it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see much of a difference and it was pretty sticky
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé but her dermatologist said there’s nothing to help with stretch marks. But, she has noticed a burn mark from a curling iron getting lighter now so seems to be helping at least with that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bertram

customer_reviews.title: I've only had this product for several days and wow ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for several days and wow!! A horrid scar I have had from a surgery 46 yrs ago has already lighten up. I just can not believe it. I never thought anything would help this scar. I can't wait to see what long term use will bring.
customer_reviews.author: Na bell

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t smell good but it absorbs well, feel more elasticity in my body and I complemented it with a cellulite cream
customer_reviews.author: Martha Romo

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Love this stretch mark cream as it really helps with getting rid of them after delivery. Very moisturizing, smells delicious, and is all natural. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great results !! 💯
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cream for almost a month & I can see great results, my skin feels firmer & the marks have faded. I used Mederma but it did not work for me. So I recommend this one & I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Arrived on time. Packaged well. Goes on smoothly and leaves skin feeling soft. I will update with results as to fading my stretch marks from my recent pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Super creamy and moisturizing. I have been using it for just over a week and have noticed softer skin, too soon to say if it will fade some new scars but I’m hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: carly bennett

customer_reviews.title: It is working well.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using different brands tried to remove body stretches, but this is the only one that is working. I definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great for scars
customer_reviews.text: COS naturals is slowly fading the scars from recent leg surgery. Leaves the skin soft and supple
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T Payton

customer_reviews.title: Not oily, soaks into your skin well
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pregnancy and I was very nervous about getting stretch marks, I am happy to say I only have very faint marks on the front of my stomach nothing on my sides or anywhere else !
customer_reviews.author: alex gastelum

customer_reviews.title: very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I just got my order , and I love it. It came properly sealed , I used it immediately and it was moisturizing with good scent. Hopefully I get a good result. Would update on my stretch mark progress
customer_reviews.author: Aghogho K

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it soaked into my skin, didn't leave my skin feeling greasy, my skin easily absorbed it. Haven't been using it long but loving it so far, helping the appearance of my stretch marks so far
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it works better than cocoa butter for stretch marks. After my pregnancy I searched for a product that would reduce my stretch marks right away. So far so good, my dark stretch marks have already lightened up. You can barely tell I have stretch marks anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Used everyday, twice a day with little results.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great; but I see no difference in the appearance of my stretch marks. Super disappointed since this product has amazing reviews.
customer_reviews.author: lyndicals

customer_reviews.title: Fades appearance of stretch marks!
customer_reviews.text: So far this stuff rocks! I’ve only used it for three days now and already see a difference in my stretch marks! Also after ordering it , I received it the very next day with regular shipping ! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of this product. The scent isn't overpowering and a small amount goes a long way and it quick drying. This is a nice product and I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Hamlet cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: My stretch marks are noticeably lighter. I put it on once a day and after 2 weeks I started seeing a change.
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I can definitely see an improvement with my stretch marks after one bottle. They are beginning to fade and my skin is soft and tighter! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this product and have been using it religiously for about two weeks now. It’s easy and quick to apply and it doesn’t leave you feeling sticky or oily.
customer_reviews.author: kim birkenfeld

customer_reviews.title: No improvement
customer_reviews.text: I don't see any improvement. I have streach mark in my butt and used this about a month and didn't not see any improvement
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!!!! I use this every morning and evening and my stretch marks have faded dramatically!! I recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Geena

customer_reviews.title: Use 2 times a day.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I can already see a difference in my stretch marks, they are lighter, I’m excited to see how they are going to look after a few months of consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: So far this product has made my skin super smooth. Goes in really quickly
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has made my skin super smooth. Goes in really quickly, and has a nice subtle smell. I've been using for 1 week, hoping to see results soon! will update with data.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to prevent stretch marks. So far, so good. Smells nice. I like that it's cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Improved almost all my stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for approximately one month, morning and night and have already started to see my stretch marks fading. It works great on super dry skin as well. Will buy more. Great cream!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this cream for a couple days and my stretch marks already look better! Can’t wait to see the difference when the bottle is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ben monroe

customer_reviews.title: All natural
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for my pregnancy to avoid getting stretch Mark's and also using it for some scars and I'm loving this product. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: victoria moskofian

customer_reviews.title: Only makes your skin feel soft
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a month and have not seen any changes in my stretch marks. I use it every night and in the morning. Have not missed a day... not the slightest change.
customer_reviews.author: nicole ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My stretch marks are nearly gone! It makes the skin feel soft. It goes on smooth and doesn't leave oily residue on your skin after. Great company with good customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this item - so far so good. Cream smells good and dries quick once applied. Feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Starting working instantly
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product a few weeks ago and immediately started using it. I'm 38 weeks pregnant now and my stretch marks have not only stopped spreading but they've even faded slightly!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 3 weeks now on my tummy and thighs(I'm about 5 months pregnant). No stretch marks so far! The smell is subtle. I only wish it came in a bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Candyce

customer_reviews.title: the lotion smells great, and it makes my skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: I got stretch marks during my pregnancy and have been using this for about 2 weeks. The stretch marks have started fading, the lotion smells great, and it makes my skin so soft! Hopefully I'll continue to get results!
customer_reviews.author: brittniguyton

customer_reviews.title: So far it works great! I use it for muscle building around the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great! I use it for muscle building around the arms and shoulder area. Although marks are still noticeable, its made a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Wisam Rabie

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell it’s effectiveness - 1 week in ...
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell it’s effectiveness - 1 week in and no visible difference. That being said, my skin has NEVER been so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for one month and I noticed my skin looking healthier and feeling smoother.
customer_reviews.author: estela san felippe

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this product, it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Along with drinking tons of water and using this 2-3 times a day, she hasn't gotten any new stretch marks! My wife loves this cream! Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Wish the bottle was bigger for the price, wasn’t enough to see results
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Great cream
customer_reviews.text: Just recently purchased this product. Love that it’s more of a lotion than a thick cream or an oil. Very excited for the results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: COS Naturals Stretch Marks and Scars Cream Natural Body Moisturizer Lotion with Peptides Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid (4 oz / 120 ml)
product_meta.description:
The Best Skin of Your Life Starts Here 

Stretch Marks are a scaring of the skin, resulting from sudden changes in growth such as puberty, rapid weight gain or muscle building. It most commonly occurs during pregnancy and is something pregnant women fear. The telltale markings are unpredictable, unsightly and embarrassing. Climb back in your bathing suit with confidence, thanks to COSNATURALS revolutionary stretch mark cream. 

Thanks to scientific advances in ingredient technology, we’ve formulated a cosmetic miracle to successfully treat and prevent stretch marks. For better preparation during pregnancy and confidence boosting results it uses unique ingredients that go to work reducing the appearance of the scars while moisturizing the skin. 

COSNATURALS Stretch Mark Cream is packed with natural ingredients like Vitamin C, E, B, and Hyaluronic Acid. These nutrients ensure that you will see all of the benefits our cream can offer while also providing deep hydration and moisture to your skin. This cream is designed for use by both men and women who are looking for a solution after weight loss, body building or just a daily body butter. 

Reduces the appearance of stretch marks and scars 
Moisturizes and nourishes skin for increased elasticity 
Reduces inflammation caused by stress on the skin 
Provides a smoother surface and even complexion 
Helps prevent the occurrence of future stretch marks 
Leaves your skin feeling soft and alive 
Made with natural ingredients and is safe to use on face and body
feature_bullets: For tummy, hips, thighs and bust.
Helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks.
Leaves your skin feeling soft and alive.
